usage_context: This document will be used by the LLM to analyze software engineering case studies, specifically for backend, frontend, and fullstack development roles.

content.title: Improving API Performance in a SaaS Platform
content.background: A SaaS company providing project management tools is experiencing latency issues in its REST API. This impacts user experience and retention.
content.problem_statement: How to optimize API performance to ensure scalability and reliability under heavy load.
objectives: Reduce average API response time by at least 40%
Improve scalability without major infrastructure overhaul
expected_outcomes: API response time below 200ms for 95% of requests
Zero critical errors in production for 30 days

change_log.change: Initial creation of case study document
